body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Having Hellkite Overlord on the field under your control
2. Having the appropriate mana available to activate his pump ability (+1/+0 until end of turn) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? To pay the cost of the ability, the card states it needs one red mana.  However, the game demands that black mana pays the cost instead. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.28 on Windows XP, though I'm about to test this on 1.29.  I did not see the fix in the log though, so I expect the bug to still be there. If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
